Configuration.Description: This is here to give any other processes that are in the queue a chance to finish their polling so no one jumps the queue.

ActivityNode.Notes: This means there's currently a process waiting for the router to disappear in NSC. We can latch onto this, so we don't have to do another disassociation.

ActivityNode.DisplayName: Check Status of Router in Queue
